00009 module cmfd_execute
00010 
00011   use cmfd_data,         only: set_up_cmfd
00012   use global
00013   use cmfd_power_solver, only: cmfd_power_execute
00014   use cmfd_slepc_solver, only: cmfd_slepc_execute
00015   use cmfd_snes_solver,  only: cmfd_snes_execute
00016  
00017   implicit none
00018 
00019 contains
00020 
00021 !==============================================================================
00022 ! EXECUTE_CMFD
00023 !==============================================================================
00024 
00025   subroutine execute_cmfd()
00026 
00027     integer :: ierr  ! petsc error code
00028 
00029     ! intialize the cmfd object 
00030     call set_up_cmfd()
00031 
00032     ! execute solver
00033     select case (trim(solver_type))
00034 
00035       case('power')
00036         call cmfd_power_execute()
00037       case('slepc')
00038         call cmfd_slepc_execute()
00039       case('snes')
00040         call cmfd_snes_execute()
00041       case DEFAULT
00042         call cmfd_power_execute()
00043 
00044     end select
00045 
00046     ! write vtk file
00047     !if(.not. cmfd_only) call write_cmfd_vtk()
00048 
00049   end subroutine execute_cmfd
00050 
00051 end module cmfd_execute
